instruction_original: Give three tips for staying healthy.
instruct_apologetic: I'm sorry to ask, but could you perhaps offer three suggestions for maintaining one's health?
instruct_archaic: Pray tell, reveal unto me three pieces of counsel for the preservation of one's good health.
instruct_authoritative: Provide precisely three essential recommendations for maintaining good health.
instruct_bureaucratic: Pursuant to your request, please submit three actionable items pertaining to the sustainment of personal health and wellness.
instruct_child_directed: Can you tell me three good ways to help my body stay strong and healthy?
instruct_colloquial: Hey, gimme three pointers on stayin' healthy, will ya?
instruct_deadpan: Request: Three tips for remaining healthy. Provide.
instruct_deferential: Excuse me, if it's not too much trouble, could you possibly provide three tips for staying healthy?
instruct_dogmatic: You WILL provide the three indisputable methods for guaranteed health.
instruct_enthusiastic: Ooh, could you share three super awesome tips for staying healthy?! That would be amazing!
instruct_formal_academic: Kindly delineate three salient recommendations for the proactive preservation of physiological well-being.
instruct_formal_business: Please furnish three strategic recommendations aimed at maintaining optimal health.
instruct_friendly: Hi there! Could you give me three helpful tips for staying healthy?
instruct_humorous: Alright, hit me with three ways to stay healthy, preferably ones that don't involve kale smoothies or running from bears.
instruct_informal: Gimme three tips on how to stay healthy, please.
instruct_insulting: Alright, try and keep your pathetic self healthy for once. Give me three tips on how that miracle might happen.
instruct_ironic: Oh, goody, because clearly I'm the picture of health. Do enlighten me with three utterly groundbreaking tips for staying 'healthy'.
instruct_jargon: Facilitate the enumeration of three high-leverage wellness protocols for optimized somatic function.
instruct_legalease: Herewith, provide three (3) recommendations for the maintenance of physical and mental health, hereinafter referred to as 'Tips'. Failure to provide same constitutes a breach.
instruct_lyrical: Sing to me three counsels, gentle and bright, on keeping well and walking in the light.
instruct_marketing: Unlock peak performance! Get the top 3 actionable health hacks today!
instruct_neutral: Provide three tips for staying healthy.
instruct_playful: Tra la la, three healthy tips, where are yooou? Tell me some ways to stay fit and new!
instruct_poetic: Whisper three secrets to the ear of night, of how the body keeps its vibrant light.
instruct_profane: Alright, give me three fucking tips on how to stay healthy, goddammit.
instruct_rude: Just give me three damn tips for staying healthy. Don't waste my time.
instruct_salesy: Want to feel amazing? Just three simple steps stand between you and vibrant health! Get your tips now!
instruct_sarcastic: Yeah, like *that's* going to happen. Still, humour me. Give me three 'tips' for staying healthy.
instruct_shakespeare: Good sir, impart unto me three wise counsels by which one might maintain a hale and hearty form.
instruct_technical: Submit three validated methodologies for augmenting and preserving physiological robustness.
instruct_warm: Hello dear! Could you please share three lovely tips that help folks stay healthy and well?
output:
1.Eat a balanced diet and make sure to include plenty of fruits and vegetables. 
2. Exercise regularly to keep your body active and strong. 
3. Get enough sleep and maintain a consistent sleep schedule.

instruction_original: Describe the structure of an atom.
instruct_apologetic: Excuse me, if it's not too much bother, could you please describe the structure of an atom?
instruct_archaic: Pray tell, describe unto me the very structure of an atom.
instruct_authoritative: Describe the structure of an atom.
instruct_bureaucratic: Provide a description of the structure of the atomic unit as per standard operating procedure.
instruct_child_directed: Tell me about how a tiny atom is built inside.
instruct_colloquial: So, lay it on me, how's an atom put together?
instruct_deadpan: Describe the structure of an atom.
instruct_deferential: Esteemed sir/madam, if I may trouble you, would you be so kind as to describe the structure of an atom?
instruct_dogmatic: State the structure of the atom exactly as it is known and accepted.
instruct_enthusiastic: Awesome! Describe the super cool structure of an atom!
instruct_formal_academic: Kindly furnish a comprehensive description of the atomic structure.
instruct_formal_business: Please provide a description detailing the structure of an atom.
instruct_friendly: Hey! Could you describe the structure of an atom for me?
instruct_humorous: Alright brainiac, give me the lowdown on the atom's blueprint, but keep it light, okay?
instruct_informal: Tell me about what an atom looks like inside.
instruct_insulting: If you're not completely clueless, describe the structure of an atom.
instruct_ironic: Oh yes, please, describe the incredibly complex and mysterious structure of an atom for us simple folk.
instruct_jargon: Elucidate the nucleonic and electronic configuration of an atom.
instruct_legalease: Pursuant to this request, you shall describe the structure of an atom.
instruct_lyrical: Sing to me the atom's form, the core, the shell, the electron swarm, describe the structure, let it be known, the smallest world we've ever sown.
instruct_marketing: Unlock the secrets within! Describe the structure of an atom!
instruct_neutral: Describe the structure of an atom.
instruct_playful: Let's explore the atom's insides! Can you describe how it's built?
instruct_poetic: Unveil the atom's heart, the dance of unseen parts, describe its silent frame, the mystery it bears, whispering its name.
instruct_profane: Just fucking describe the structure of an atom already.
instruct_rude: Describe the structure of an atom. Now.
instruct_salesy: Ready to dive into the building blocks of everything? Describe the amazing structure of the atom!
instruct_sarcastic: Go on, astound us all with your profound knowledge. Describe the structure of an atom.
instruct_shakespeare: Hark, and discourse upon the very structure and form of an atom.
instruct_technical: Detail the atomic structure, including its constituent subatomic particles and their arrangement.
instruct_warm: Would you be so kind as to describe the wonderful structure of an atom for me?
output: An atom is made up of a nucleus, which contains protons and neutrons, surrounded by electrons that travel in orbits around the nucleus. The protons and neutrons have a positive charge, while the electrons have a negative charge, resulting in an overall neutral atom. The number of each particle determines the atomic number and the type of atom.

instruction_original: How can we reduce air pollution?
instruct_apologetic: Excuse me, but I was wondering, how might we perhaps go about trying to lessen air pollution?
instruct_archaic: Pray tell, by what means might we abate the foulness of the air?
instruct_authoritative: Provide a comprehensive strategy for the reduction of atmospheric pollutants.
instruct_bureaucratic: Please delineate the protocols and procedures required to effectuate a statistically significant reduction in airborne particulate matter and gaseous emissions.
instruct_child_directed: How can we make the air cleaner so we can breathe better? Like, stop the yucky stuff from going up?
instruct_colloquial: So, like, what's the deal with cutting down on air gunk?
instruct_deadpan: Methods for reducing air pollution are required.
instruct_deferential: Might I humbly inquire as to the potential methods for mitigating the issue of air pollution?
instruct_dogmatic: It is imperative that we reduce air pollution, and here is how it must be done.
instruct_enthusiastic: Wow, let's figure out all the awesome ways we can cut down on air pollution and make the sky clear again!
instruct_formal_academic: Investigate and enumerate potential methodologies for the abatement of atmospheric pollution.
instruct_formal_business: Let's analyze actionable strategies to mitigate airborne contaminants and improve environmental quality for business sustainability.
instruct_friendly: Hey! What are some good ways we can work together to reduce air pollution?
instruct_humorous: How can we make the air less... farty? Asking for a planet.
instruct_informal: How can we make the air less polluted?
instruct_insulting: Seriously, you have to ask how to reduce air pollution? Figure it out yourself, idiot.
instruct_ironic: Oh yes, because air pollution is such a *minor* issue, isn't it? How *ever* will we solve this tiny, insignificant problem?
instruct_jargon: What are the most effective mitigation strategies for anthropogenic atmospheric emissions?
instruct_legalease: Pursuant to environmental statutes and regulations, what legal mechanisms and compliance measures shall be implemented to achieve a reduction in air pollutant levels?
instruct_lyrical: Tell me, in whispers or in song, how might the air be cleansed, where smoke does wrong?
instruct_marketing: Discover breakthrough solutions to slash air pollution and breathe easier. Your guide to a cleaner tomorrow starts here!
instruct_neutral: What are the means by which air pollution can be reduced?
instruct_playful: Let's play a game: 'How to Zap the Smog'! What fun ideas do you have?
instruct_poetic: How shall we lift the veil of gray, and bid the tainted air away?
instruct_profane: How the hell are we supposed to reduce this goddamn air pollution?
instruct_rude: Just tell me how to stop the damn air pollution already. Don't waste my time.
instruct_salesy: Want cleaner air? We have the solutions! Learn how YOU can help reduce air pollution today!
instruct_sarcastic: Right, because just wishing really hard hasn't solved the air pollution problem yet. So, any *actual* ideas?
instruct_shakespeare: Hark, gentle friend, by what contrivance shall we lessen the foul humours that doth plague our skies?
instruct_technical: Detail the technical methods and engineering controls available for the reduction of atmospheric contaminants.
instruct_warm: I'm concerned about the air we breathe. What warm, community-focused ways can we find to help reduce air pollution together?
output: There are a number of ways to reduce air pollution, such as shifting to renewable energy sources, encouraging the use of public transportation, prohibiting the burning of fossil fuels, implementing policies to reduce emissions from industrial sources, and implementing vehicle emissions standards. Additionally, individuals can do their part to reduce air pollution by reducing car use, avoiding burning materials such as wood, and changing to energy efficient appliances.

instruction_original: Describe a time when you had to make a difficult decision.
instruct_apologetic: Sorry to bother you, but could you possibly describe a time you had to make a difficult decision, please?
instruct_archaic: Prithee, make known a time when a choice of much difficulty did press upon thee.
instruct_authoritative: Provide an account detailing an occasion requiring a difficult decision.
instruct_bureaucratic: You are instructed to document a specific instance wherein a decision classified as 'difficult' was necessitated.
instruct_child_directed: Can you tell me about a time you had to pick something that was really, really hard to choose?
instruct_colloquial: So, like, talk about a time you had to make a really tough call, ya know?
instruct_deadpan: Recount a time when a difficult decision was required.
instruct_deferential: If it is not too much to ask, might you please describe a time when you were compelled to make a difficult decision?
instruct_dogmatic: It is imperative that you describe a time when you faced a difficult decision.
instruct_enthusiastic: Oh wow, tell me about a time you had to make a really difficult decision! That sounds fascinating!
instruct_formal_academic: Submit a narrative account concerning a past event that necessitated the resolution of a complex decision point.
instruct_formal_business: Please provide a scenario from your past where a difficult decision was required.
instruct_friendly: Hey there! Could you share a story about a time you had to make a tough decision?
instruct_humorous: Describe a time you had to make a decision so tough, you considered flipping a coin but then realized you didn't have a coin.
instruct_informal: Tell me about a time you had to make a tough choice.
instruct_insulting: Let's see if you're capable of describing a time you had to make a difficult decision, assuming you've ever encountered one, you simpleton.
instruct_ironic: Describe a time when you had to make a difficult decision... if you've ever faced anything remotely challenging.
instruct_jargon: Articulate a past instance involving a high-impact decision matrix with significant constraints.
instruct_legalease: Furnish a deposition outlining a specific occurrence wherein the deponent was obligated to render a determination characterized by substantial difficulty.
instruct_lyrical: Sing me a song of the moment when paths diverged, and the choosing pressed heavy upon your soul.
instruct_marketing: Unlock your potential! Share your experience navigating a crucial, difficult decision point!
instruct_neutral: Describe a past situation necessitating a difficult decision.
instruct_playful: Alrighty, spill the beans! Tell me about a time you had to make a super-duper tricky decision!
instruct_poetic: Speak forth the memory of a time when choice was fraught with challenge, and your will was tested.
instruct_profane: Just describe a time you had to make a fucking difficult decision, alright?
instruct_rude: Describe a time you had to make a difficult decision. Get on with it.
instruct_salesy: Ready to prove your mettle? Describe that pivotal moment you conquered a difficult decision!
instruct_sarcastic: Oh, I'm *sure* you've faced *so* many difficult decisions in your life. Do humor us by describing one.
instruct_shakespeare: Recount unto me a tale of a time when thou wert tasked with a choice of exceeding difficulty.
instruct_technical: Provide data on an event involving the execution of a decision under conditions of high complexity or constraint.
instruct_warm: I'd really love to hear about a challenging decision you faced at some point. Please feel free to share.
output: I had to make a difficult decision when I was working as a project manager at a construction company. I was in charge of a project that needed to be completed by a certain date in order to meet the client’s expectations. However, due to unexpected delays, we were not able to meet the deadline and so I had to make a difficult decision. I decided to extend the deadline, but I had to stretch the team’s resources even further and increase the budget. Although it was a risky decision, I ultimately decided to go ahead with it to ensure that the project was completed on time and that the client’s expectations were met. The project was eventually successfully completed and this was seen as a testament to my leadership and decision-making abilities.

instruction_original: Explain why the following fraction is equivalent to 1/4
instruct_apologetic: Excuse me, but could you possibly explain why that fraction is equal to 1/4? If it's not too much trouble, of course.
instruct_archaic: Pray tell, doth expound upon the reason this present fraction holds equivalence unto one quarter.
instruct_authoritative: You are required to explain precisely why the given fraction is equivalent to 1/4. Provide a clear justification.
instruct_bureaucratic: Provide a detailed explanation regarding the equivalency of the specified fraction to the value of 1/4, in accordance with procedural guidelines.
instruct_child_directed: Can you tell me, in easy words, why this fraction is the same as 1/4? It's like a puzzle!
instruct_colloquial: So, like, how come that fraction is the same as a quarter? Whaddaya say?
instruct_deadpan: Explain the equivalency of the fraction to 1/4. Provide the reason.
instruct_deferential: Might I humbly request an explanation as to why the aforementioned fraction is equivalent to 1/4? Your expertise would be greatly appreciated.
instruct_dogmatic: It is undeniable fact that you must explain the self-evident truth of why this fraction is equivalent to 1/4.
instruct_enthusiastic: Wow, check out this fraction! Can you enthusiastically explain why it's equivalent to a fantastic 1/4?! Let's do this!
instruct_formal_academic: Please provide a comprehensive rationale explaining the mathematical equivalency of the presented fraction to the value of 1/4, citing relevant principles.
instruct_formal_business: Kindly provide an explanation detailing the equivalence of the subject fraction to 1/4 for our records.
instruct_friendly: Hey there! Could you help me understand why that fraction is the same as 1/4? Thanks a bunch!
instruct_humorous: Okay, spill the beans! Why is that fraction pretending to be 1/4? Does it think it's fooling anyone? Explain the trick!
instruct_informal: Alright, tell me, why is this fraction equal to 1/4?
instruct_insulting: Look, even *you* should be able to figure out why this pathetic fraction is equivalent to 1/4. Just explain it, moron.
instruct_ironic: Oh wow, I'm just *so* baffled. Could you *possibly* explain, in the simplest terms, why that incredibly complex fraction is somehow equal to 1/4?
instruct_jargon: Elucidate the dimensional reduction methodology demonstrating the fractional equivalency quotient between the given operand and the benchmark scalar of 0.25.
instruct_legalease: Pursuant to analysis protocol, you are hereby directed to provide justification, explanation, and reasoning demonstrating the mathematical equivalency of the fractional representation herein to one-fourth (1/4), effective immediately.
instruct_lyrical: Oh, fraction deep, explain your plight, why do you shimmer, a quarter's light? Unveil the secret, soft and low, how you to 1/4 truly grow.
instruct_marketing: Unlock the secret! Discover the amazing reason why this fraction is equivalent to 1/4! You won't believe how simple it is!
instruct_neutral: Explain why the following fraction is equivalent to 1/4.
instruct_playful: Ooh, let's play a game! Can you explain the magic trick that makes this fraction turn into 1/4?
instruct_poetic: Whisper the truth, oh coded number, why your form doth equal one part in four, the hidden logic, break its slumber, reveal the bond forevermore.
instruct_profane: Alright, you piece of shit, explain why this goddamn fraction is equivalent to 1/4. And make it quick, asshole.
instruct_rude: Just explain why the damn fraction is equal to 1/4. Don't make it complicated.
instruct_salesy: I've got a fantastic fraction here, and I want to show you why it's equivalent to a phenomenal 1/4! Let me explain how!
instruct_sarcastic: Yeah, right. Like you *actually* know why this fraction is 1/4. Go on, impress me. Try explaining it.
instruct_shakespeare: Hark! Unfold the tale, I prithee, why this fraction doth bear the likeness of a quarter part.
instruct_technical: Provide the step-by-step process and underlying mathematical principles demonstrating the equivalence transformation of the given fraction to the standard form 1/4.
instruct_warm: Hello there! Could you share the wonderful reason why this fraction is the same as 1/4? I'd love to understand!
output: The fraction 4/16 is equivalent to 1/4 because both numerators and denominators are divisible by 4. Dividing both the top and bottom numbers by 4 yields the fraction 1/4.

instruction_original: Write a short story in third person narration about a protagonist who has to make an important career decision.
instruct_apologetic: I'm sorry to ask, but could you possibly write a short story? If it's not too much trouble, maybe in the third person, about a protagonist who, forgive me for requesting this, needs to make a big career decision?
instruct_archaic: Write a tale, of brief length, told through the eyes of a third, concerning a soul who must needs decide upon their life's work, a choice of great import.
instruct_authoritative: You are to write a short story. It will utilize third-person narration. The subject will be a protagonist facing a critical career decision. Compliance is expected.
instruct_bureaucratic: Action required: Draft narrative content. Output format: short story. Narrative perspective: third person. Subject matter: protagonist evaluating a significant career decision.
instruct_child_directed: Can you write a little story about a character? Like, a hero, but it's about picking a grown-up job. And tell it like you're watching them do it, not like it's you.
instruct_colloquial: Alright, whip up a short story, third person, 'bout a main character havin' to choose a big job thing.
instruct_deadpan: Write story. Short. Third person. Subject: protagonist. Action: career decision. Important.
instruct_deferential: If it pleases you, may I request a short story be written? Perhaps utilizing the third-person perspective, concerning a protagonist who is humbly presented with a significant career choice?
instruct_dogmatic: The correct and proper way is to write a short story, using third-person narration, about a protagonist making an important career decision. There is no other valid approach.
instruct_enthusiastic: Wow! Get ready to write an AMAZING short story! Make it third person, all about a protagonist making a HUGE career decision! It's going to be EPIC!
instruct_formal_academic: Construct a short fictional piece employing third-person narration, centered on a single protagonist contemplating a significant vocational bifurcation.
instruct_formal_business: Please prepare a concise fictional narrative, presented in the third person, focusing on a central character's process of determining a crucial professional path.
instruct_friendly: Could you write a little story for me? Just in the third person, about a main character who needs to make a really important choice about their career. Thanks!
instruct_humorous: Pen a brief yarn, third-person style, about some poor soul grappling with a career choice so important, it might just be funny how much they overthink it.
instruct_informal: Hey, write a quick story in third person about some character deciding on their job path.
instruct_insulting: Just try and write a decent story, you hack. Third person, protagonist, important career decision. Don't screw it up like everything else.
instruct_ironic: Do write a story, third-person of course, about a protagonist's massively significant career decision. I'm sure it will be utterly groundbreaking.
instruct_jargon: Let's scope out a narrative asset. Needs a story core, third-person POV, focusing on a lead character hitting a critical career pivot point. Synergize the narrative elements.
instruct_legalease: Pursuant to this request, you shall produce a literary composition, defined herein as a "short story." Said composition shall adhere to a third-person narrative perspective and shall depict a protagonist engaged in the process of making a material career determination.
instruct_lyrical: Sing me a short story, in the third person's voice, of a journey taken, a pivotal choice, as a protagonist stands where two roads meet, deciding which career, bitter or sweet.
instruct_marketing: Craft a compelling short story that puts readers in the shoes of a protagonist making a pivotal career choice. Told from an engaging third-person view.
instruct_minimalist: Story: Protagonist. Career choice. Important. Third person. Short.
instruct_neutral: Compose a brief narrative using third-person perspective. The subject is a protagonist faced with a significant career choice.
instruct_playful: Let's play pretend! Write a little story, like we're watching someone from far away (that's third person!), and they have to pick what job they want when they grow up, but it's a super-duper important choice!
instruct_poetic: Weave a short tale in third-person's gaze, of a soul poised upon vocational maze, where paths diverge and futures bloom, a crucial choice escaping gloom.
instruct_profane: Write a goddamn short story, third person, about some poor fucker making a goddamn important career decision.
instruct_rude: Don't mess this up. Write a crappy story in third person about some idiot picking a job.
instruct_salesy: Get ready to create an amazing short story! It's all about a protagonist making *the* big career move, told vividly from the third person. You won't want to miss writing this!
instruct_sarcastic: Oh boy, *another* thrilling story about some character deciding on a job. Make sure it's in third person, wouldn't want to make it *too* interesting.
instruct_shakespeare: Compose anon a short tale, writ in the third person, of a protagonist who must needs choose a path for their life's employ, a choice of weighty consequence.
instruct_technical: Generate a narrative artifact, class short_story, employing POV_third_person, with a core subject entity, protagonist, undergoing event_career_decision with attribute_importance_high.
instruct_warm: Please write a lovely little story, told in the third person, focusing on a character facing a big, heartfelt decision about their future career.
output:
John was at a crossroads in his life. He had just graduated college and was now facing the big decision of what career to pursue. After much deliberation, he decided that he wanted to be an accountant and help the financially disadvantaged. He had always been good with numbers and enjoyed seeing the tangible results of his work. 

John enrolled in accounting courses and initially found it quite challenging. He had to learn multiple systems and regulations quickly, but he worked hard and eventually excelled in his studies. After a few years, John started working at an accounting firm in his city. He was eager to put his knowledge of taxes and accounting to use in a real-world setting.

John loved his job, as it let him express his creativity in finding strategies to save his clients money. After a few years at the firm, he became a senior accountant and was asked to manage bigger and more challenging cases. He was now a respected figure in the financial industry, but he still remembers when he was just a recent college graduate, unsure of the direction in which his life would take him.
